alert.note: Alert for Itawamba; Monroe (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 5:01PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Itawamba and northeastern Monroe Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 500 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Amory, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Amory, Aberdeen, Smithville, Tremont, New Salem, New Wren, Clay, Hatley, Gattman, Eastman, Quincy, Turon, Wise Gap, Wren, Sipsey Fork, Becker, Cardsville, Tilden, Splunge and Athens. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for northeastern Mississippi.
